attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hello,
I am writing to request your full support on submitting my ideas of television programmes about black achievers from the past and present. It is a sad fact that the achievements of black people have been overlooked and ignored. I believe that very little progress has been addressed upon the issues about, past and present black achievers who have contributed their own successes in Education, The Arts, Media, Commerce, Politics, Agriculture, Architecture, Science, Inventions, Explorers, and the Military within cultural society.

Here are my ideas for television programmes about black achievers: 
1.	BLACK HISTORY MONTH CEREMONY AWARDS - This is an entertainment series to celebrate the black people who have contributed to society. 
2.	THE AFRICAN EMPIRES - Historical programme 
3.	BLACK ROMAN EMPERORS - Historical programme  
4.	IRA ALDRIDGE AWARDS - An equivalent to the Lawrence Olivier Awards for accomplishments within the Dramatic and Theatre Arts Industry. 
5.	BLACK INVENTORS AND SCIENTISTS - Historical programme about their achievements.
6.	BLACK CLASSICAL MUSIC COMPOSERS AND MUSICIANS - Historical programme about their life and works.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
